MSSql.Query: SELECT MenuCode AS '菜单编码', MenuName AS '菜单名称', ParentCode AS '父级编码', Assembly AS '程序集', NameSpace AS '命名空间', EntityName AS '实体名称', Level AS '层级', CASE IfEnd WHEN 0 THEN '否' ELSE '是' END AS '是否末级' FROM P_Menu WHERE (1=1) AND (2=2);

Sqlite.Query: SELECT MenuCode AS '菜单编码', MenuName AS '菜单名称', ParentCode AS '父级编码', Assembly AS '程序集', NameSpace AS '命名空间', EntityName AS '实体名称', Level AS '层级', CASE IfEnd WHEN 0 THEN '否' ELSE '是' END AS '是否末级' FROM P_Menu WHERE (1=1) AND (2=2);

MSSql.Query: SELECT so.name AS '表名称' , ex.value AS '表中文' FROM sys.sysobjects so LEFT JOIN sys.extended_properties ex ON ex.major_id = so.id AND ex.minor_id = 0 WHERE so.xtype IN ( 'U', 'V' ) AND (1=1) AND (2=2);

Sqlite.Query: SELECT name AS '表名称' FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'

MSSql.Query: SELECT sc.name AS '列名称' , ex.value AS '列中文' , sc.length AS '长度' , st.name AS '类型' FROM sys.sysobjects so INNER JOIN sys.syscolumns sc ON sc.id = so.id INNER JOIN sys.systypes st ON st.xtype = sc.xtype LEFT JOIN sys.extended_properties ex ON ex.major_id = so.id AND ex.minor_id = sc.colid WHERE so.xtype IN ( 'U', 'V' ) AND (1=1) AND (2=2);
